Reviews.Content: Dirty,cheap,motel PR was good, some problems with the trafic, the hotels were to expensive for the services.The people are very frienly. The first hotel where we stay turned out to by a sheap motel, the name was Campomar Hotel  restaurant smell was horrible, the carpet was so dirty you could't walk bare feet, but the second one was great , the name is Hotel San Miguel Plaza in Bayamon, PR tel. [--] (5 star)
Reviews.Author: Fiolbeli
